content.rendered:
Directed by Syed Ahmad Afzal.

Written by Pankaj Matta.

Cast Randeep Hooda(Shankar Singh Malik). Akshay Oberoi(Rajesh Dhiman). Rajneesh Duggal(Gajraj Singh). Piaa Bajpai(Poonam Sharma). Meenakshi Dixit(Rashi). Rajendra Sethi(Pushpendra). Kumar Saurabh(Shani Baba). Jai Hind Kumar(Harnaam (as Jaihind Kumar)). Abhimanue Arun(Dracula Aka Sooraj) . Kulvinder Bakshish(Naresh). Rajesh BÃ gotra(Blood supplier (as Rajesh Kumar)). Atul Chouthmal(Swaraj Singh). Sanjay Dumroo(Mithuniya). Priya Gupta(Sunita (as Gupta Priya)). Rehan Kidwai(Dr. Sabharwal). Malay Mishra(Kumar). Shreya Narayan(Neelam)

Language Hindi.

Producers Raghav Gupta. Husaini Hasnain. Manish Joshi. Raj Malik. Ravi Sarin. Maninder Singh. Nitika Thakur.

Production Krian Pictures.
